entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -17.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -22.8°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
